References: J. Drake et al., ATel #1246 and #1603; T.N.Tarasova (IBVS #5807)
Event Type: Detection of supersoft X-ray source (SSS) and periodic light variations
Date: 2007 October 18 to 2008 June 18 for Swift XRT detection; 2007 August 18.90 and October 18.68 UT for spectra
Telescope: 38-cm telescope of the Crimean Astrophysical Observatory
Instrument: CCD V for photometry; SAO RAS 1-m reflector (spectral range 3800-7530A, resolution 8A) for spectra
Observatory: Crimean Astrophysical Observatory (Ukraine); SAO RAS (for spectra)
